#summary Specify a shadow effect that will be applied to the border box of an object.

== Usage ==

--webkit-box-shadow: 3px 3px 5px #000;

== Values ==

 * offset-x
 * offset-y
 * shadow size
 * color

--webkit-box-shadow: <offset-x> <offset-y> <shadow size> <color>;

== Browser compatibility ==

 * Safari 3
 * Adobe AIR 1.0 (mac only?)

== Further reading ==

  * [http://developer.apple.com/documentation/AppleApplications/Reference/SafariCSSRef/Articles/StandardCSSProperties.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP30001266--webkit-box-shadow:The -webkit-box-shadow property on ADC]
